house_listing.house_location: 140 Old Bastrop Rd., Cedar Creek Cedar Creek, TEXAS 78612
house_listing.house_description: Directions: From Bastrop Hwy. 71 West toward Austin, just south of Dale Cook Texaco.This Home is on 2 Acres, and is a possible commercial property. This MH has all the utilities, and there are also other building on the property. The property is completely fenced. LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION!File#: W0057

highlights.item: Near Dale Cooks Texaco on Hwy. 71.
